name: Ezra (AimeeJacob)
description:
Ezra is a small hidden object game.

Ezra has moved with his parents to a new small town. He sits in his new bedroom and listens to his music. His mom  wants him to finally unpack his moving boxes. When he clears out the boxes in his room, he has some thoughts while he unpacks his stuff. We are here to help Ezra and will find all the little clues to help him find out his true self.
